name: Flappy (geekcodeplanet)
description:
Flappy, a game designed during the 10 days Holiday of Code.

Students were tasked with creating different characters, which was merged into a single game (the characters can be selected from the character screen), while learning about coding principles and basics

Students developers  (first name used only)

  • Mohammed
  • Alex
  • Chidi
  • Ifeanyi
  • Solomon
  • Moses

Assets from: freesoung.org and itch.io.
Software used: ClickTeam Fusion Pro, Piskel and Inkscape
